name: Pyrrhic Victory - Updated
description:
Should you sacrifice your barracks to improve your barricades or the other way around?

There are two ways to win in Pyrric Victory: attack and defense.

If you chose to attack you’ll have to build a lot of tough troops to annihilate your opponent’s Citadel. This means sacrificing your defense.

If you choose to defend your Citadel, you’ll have to build tough walls and powerful turrets. This means sacrificing your attack. You need to have less destroyed buildings than your opponent at the end of the counter.

This is the updated version of this game, which was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare #43!

The theme was: Sacrifices Must Be Made
